p: In this work, thin steel plates made of the low-alloy steel with dimensions of 20 mm Ã— 20 mm and a thickness of 0.8 mm were used. To prevent corrosion of the steel, the samples were stored under a layer of chloroform. The chemical composition of these materials was analyzed with Optical Emission Spectrometer Solaris CCD Plus produced by GNR Analitycal Instruments (Nottingham, UK) and are summarized in Table 1.
